column3: Eat the fried papad and let the taste stand for hours. Very tasty and original
Little spicy - little sweet deep fried thinly sliced jackfruit. This will beat any chips in market.
Authentic and  original gravy made fresh everyday.
Boiled raw mango gravy and seasoned with green chilly and garlic. Your toung will say you want more and  your eye will say  Don't make me cry with this spicy food
Variety of laddu options are wheat laddu rava laddo Bundi laddu and more- call me to get more details.
Rich and tasty  made with original safron and pure clarified butter. Lots of cashews and raisins inside.
Melts inside your mouth  2 options available  can be prepared using ripened banana or jackfruit.
Healthy filling banana tortilla made with whole wheat. Call me to order. Similar to this - I can prepare other roti or tortilla for daily use
